title: SKMatrix.MakeRotation - wrong parameter name "radians"
body:
Hi!

`SKMatrix SKMatrix.MakeRotation(float radians)`
should be renamed to
`SKMatrix SKMatrix.MakeRotation(float degrees)`
as this is greatly misleading!

I am using "1.49.4-beta"

comments.author: migueldeicaza
comments.body: The argument is in radians, I am adding a new method "MakeRotationDegrees" that will take degrees.
